item.title: #en @ 1527335492710064144
item.description:
@Win_OpenData @MoorePlasticRes Pay it forward, dear friend!
Also, you've already done so much for me! Our passion-fueled collaborations have ignited transformations in my perspectives that have been instrumental in my accomplishments.
